answers.answer: Sweets! I never had a sweet tooth before but now its just crazy.
It's different things different days for me but always chocolate mmmmm or spicy chicken
All I wanted this pregnancy was sweet things, now thanks to complications I'm on a low-fat diet so zero chocolate :-( Enjoying icey poles tho! Also helps with the reflux.
I am craving chocolate so bad! Thankfully all i want to eat apart from that is fresh fruit so I guess it balances out!
to much chocolate can lead to high blood pressure be careful
Chocolate all the way but im also eating lots of fruit and vegies so hopefully thats ok

As Alexbabyy said be careful! I'm 30 weeks pregnant and the doctor just diagnosed me with gastional diabetes. I'm on a strict diet and I have to check my sugar four times a day not fun at all. The beginning of my pregnancy I barely ate anything but bread ate a lot of sweet stuff and fruits. And I would sometimes skip meals because the sweets made me lose my appetite. So ladies so down with the sweets and take in some protein. Hope this help.

question: Omg I crave a lot of chocolate.... is that bad? What do you ladies crave?
title: CHOCOHOLIC!!!
